import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Forms.css'; import Modal from '../Modal/Modal'; const Forms = () => { const [isActiveForm, setIsActiveForm] = useState(false); return (
check_box New list
brush New note with drawing
image New note with image
keep
add_alert person_add palette image archive more_vert undo redo
) } export default Forms
